entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
